name: Arthr
slogan: Making Everyday Easier for People with Arthritis
description:
Arthr creates and sells brilliant products with great design to make everyday easier for people with arthritis.

All our products are co-designed and tested with users and healthcare experts to ensure they solve genuine problems and are of the highest quality.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Reporting to the Head of Marketing, the Digital Marketing Manager owns and executes the digital marketing strategy across paid, owned and earned digital channels. They contribute to revenue generated from both new and existing customers by developing effective lead generation, retention marketing, conversion optimisation and brand engagement activity. 

The Digital Marketing Manager will:
* Drive customer acquisition campaigns, including testing and optimisation of biddable and display channel funnels including AdWords, native advertising, and paid social
* Analyse marketing activity, audience and competitor activity to provide insights to improve performance, conversion and LTV
* Conduct agile testing of content, channels and landing pages to improve success
* Manage the website development, testing and conversion optimisation plan
* Develop eCRM strategy, including lead nurturing, lifecycle communication and segmentation campaigns
* Work with relevant agencies and internal teams to generate content (e.g. for product launches) for distribution across paid, earned and owned channels
* Oversee media plans and provides guidance on targeting, spend targets, bidding strategy, messaging strategy and experience design
* Achieve best practice benchmarks for the website, in terms of converting traffic to leads
* Define and execute targeted email campaigns
* Be responsible for optimising website SEO performance and managing web development resource accordingly
* Design and oversee the customer Ambassadors programme

**Who Might be Ideal**

You will be highly organised, with real attention to detail and the ability to grasp new ideas quickly. You will be analytical and data-driven to maximise channel and content performance. 

A self-starter with an entrepreneurial spirit, you will have a passion for best-in-class digital marketing and a desire to work within a dynamic, growing, purpose-led start-up environment.

Preferred Skills and Experience
* A marketing qualification
* 4+ years of experience running digital marketing campaigns across social, search and eCRM
* Experience in Optimisation and A/B testing, Google Analytics, AdWords, Paid Social platforms (eg: LinkedIn Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram) and SEO
* Knowledge of operations automation, attribution best-practice, lead processing and database management
* eCommerce and/or consumer product marketing experience

Package:
Up to £35k
25 days holiday
A chance to make a difference to the lives of millions of people

**About Arthr**

Arthritis affects over 10m people in the UK and over 350m people globally. The condition impacts the seemly small, everyday things in big ways: difficulty getting out of bed; problems getting dressed or getting in and out of the car.

Whilst there are countless products and aids on the market aimed at helping people with arthritis, most are poorly designed or poorly made.

Arthr is a new breed of business with social purpose sitting at its core. We aim to transform the market by creating and selling brilliant consumer products with great design to make everyday easier for people with arthritis.
